views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10, 11 and 12

ConfirmToSend Gives the Opportunity to Show the Confirmation Popup Before Calling and Sending Texts on the System Applications!

More to Come in the Next Updates!

Configure options from Settings.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak and its options.

See Screenshots below.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.0.7 - Added the option to Enable the WeChat Emoticons Send Confirmation (Included WeEmoticonSendConfirm Available on My Repo). Version 1.0.5
- Added the option to Enable the WhatsApp Send Message Confirmation (thanks @_024ka for testing).
Version 1.0.4
- Added support for iOS 12 and arm64e/A12.
Version 1.0.3
- Added the WhatsApp application Confirmation on Calling Contacts in Chats.
- Added the WhatsApp application Confirmation on Video Calling Contacts in Chats.
Version 1.0.2
- Added the LINE application Confirmation on Sending Texts (included My Tweak confirmToLINE on My Repo).
- Neat the UIAlertController Messages (as Requested).
Version 1.0.1
- Should Now be Fixed the Double Check Issue on Send Confirmation when sending Texts on Messages for some Users.
